conbody.p: Once an assignment is published, its instance will appear in the Published assignments tab.

fig.title: Published assignments tab in teacher interface

image.alt: Published assignments tab in teacher interface"

conbody.p: Elements of the Published assignments tab:
Press the Extend deadline button to extend assignment deadline. A dialog box will appear on your screen.
conbody.note: Information in the Progress tab (see ) refers to the assignment selected in the Published assignments tab.
conbody.p: Press the Close button to finish working with the assignment (see ). It is recommended to close an assignment for which all students have turned in their work and it has been graded by the teacher.
The Show closed assignments checkbox triggers display of closed assignments in the list. Closed assignments will be listed in gray.
conbody.note: After assignment is closed, the Close button becomes Open and can be used to reopen the assignment.
conbody.p: Press the Remove button to delete current publication. You will be asked for a confirmation.
You have to actually type DELETE in the corresponding field to confirm the removal of an assignment with all its publications.
conbody.note: Removing a publication will irrevocably delete this instance of the assignment, together with all attached files and associated data - including student answers, comments, and grades - from the cloud storage (see ). It is strongly recommended to create an assignment report (see ) and file a copy of the assignment to the archive (see ) before removing it.
conbody.p: See also section _fixme_ [xref] for deleting an assignment with all its publications in a single operation.
